summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the functionality, configuration, and performance of the T5 transformer model across various scenarios such as generation, past key‑value handling, mixed‑precision, weight sharing, ONNX export, and integration with pipelines.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of the T5 implementation for production use, facilitating safe deployment, maintenance, and continuous improvement of NLP applications that rely on this model.
